segments.text: Congratulations ! Mr . Stuart ! You won the city marathon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I am very excited .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are all very proud of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am very happy , too . It was a big game and I won .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I watched the race with my children . We saw you run to the finish line . We all screamed with excitement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was really an exciting moment .
segments.speaker: S2
